00012 #include "Log.h"

00014 #include <sstream>

00016 namespace Util
00017 {
00018 
00019    /*
00020    * Constructor, with no function name.
00021    */
00022    Exception::Exception(const char *function, const char *message, 
00023                         const char *file, int line, int echo) 
00024     : message_()
00025    {
00026       message_ = "   Function: ";
00027       message_.append(function);
00028       message_.append("\n");
00029       message_.append("   Message : ");
00030       message_.append(message);
00031       message_.append("\n");
00032       message_.append("   File    : ");
00033       message_.append(file);
00034       message_.append("\n");
00035       message_.append("   Line    : ");
00036       std::ostringstream s;
00037       s << line;
00038       message_.append(s.str());
00039       message_.append("\n");
00040       if (echo) {
00041         write(Log::file());
00042       }
00043    }
00044 
00045    /*
00046    * Constructor, with no function name.
00047    */
00048    Exception::Exception(const char *message, 
00049                         const char *file, int line, int echo) 
00050     : message_()
00051    {
00052       message_ = "   Message : ";
00053       message_.append(message);
00054       message_.append("\n");
00055       message_.append("   File    : ");
00056       message_.append(file);
00057       message_.append("\n");
00058       message_.append("   Line    : ");
00059       std::ostringstream s;
00060       s << line;
00061       message_.append(s.str());
00062       message_.append("\n");
00063       if (echo) {
00064          write(Log::file());
00065       }
00066    }
00067 
00068    /*
00069    * Destructor.
00070    */
00071    Exception::~Exception()
00072    {}
00073 
00074    /*
00075    * Write message to stream.
00076    */
00077    void Exception::write(std::ostream &out)
00078    {  out << message_; }
00079 
00080    /*
00081    * Get message by reference
00082    */
00083    std::string& Exception::message()
00084    {  return message_; }
